text: sportbank (Ukrainian: спортба́нк) is the first niche bank in Ukraine. After the Russian invasion of Ukraine in 2022, the bank redesigned its operations to make donating more convenient to the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The concept of the sport focused neobank firstly arose in 2014, while the bank was launched in 2019 by Nick Izmailov and Denys Saprykin. According to DELO business outlet, TASCOMGROUP has invested nearly $17m into the development of sportbank. In December 2021 sportbank joined Ukrainian government anti-COVID finance assistance program eSupport (єПідтримка). == References == Category:Banks of Ukraine
title: Sportbank
